title: “What We Are Facing Is The Extinction Of Formerly Free Humans…” (FORMER NORMIE/PFIZER VP DR. MICHAEL YEADON)
cleaned_text:
February 24, 2022 update – Forbes on “SMART National Vaccine Passes,” and Joe Rogan in conversation with Maajid Nawaz on the whole COVIDtopian Shebang.

Publisher’s Note: Former Pfizer VP, scientist, toxicologist, and pharmaceutical developer Dr. Michael Yeadon’s in-depth interview with Children’s Health Defense this week is eye-opening, revelatory, and probably will come as a bit of a shock for Humans awakening from the past two years of the contagious Virus – of Fear, that is.

If you are just joining the Party, we suggest searching the following words and phrases here: Transhumanism, Technocracy, The Great Reset, the 4th Industrial Revolution, Eugenics, and the World Economic Forum – all are vital terms and historical phenomena that we all must comprehend as #TeamHuman confronts this unprecedented Challenge, not just to our Sovereignty, but to our essential Humanity, as Dr. Yeadon suggests.

A bit of history from our corner…

Six years ago, after the 2016 US presidential “election” in which Mr. Trump bested Ms. Clinton, we published Plan V: Toward A 2nd Vermont Republic, observing that Vermonters were now caught between a Hard Globalist Rock (Team Obama/Clinton/Bush/Biden) and a Faux Nationalist Hard Place (Team Trump and Co.). See below.

We were wrong about one thing – it isn’t just Vermonters trapped between Hard Globalists and Faux Nationalists. Our entire species – #TeamHuman – must now wrestle with this difficult evolutionary moment for US as a species. If this sounds like hyberbole, we suggest taking some time ro peruse the above links.
